basic.floral_language:
Livistona decipiens 
Floriography: big and tall, handsome, persistent. 
This fan palm is a big tree with fan shaped, leathery and glossy. Garden uses are for yards, roadsides and flower beds. The leaves are raw material of palm leaf fans.
The fan palm prefers sunny habitat, slight shade tolerant. Strong bright sunlight could bring damages. It could bloom yellow flowers in March to April if growing well.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers in March-April, yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, slight shade tolerance, avoid scorching light
maintenance.watering: Not resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
